action.action-desc: Mr. Taylor (for himself and Mr. Correa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To amend the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 to prohibit the use of funds appropriated to the Department of Homeland Security for the procurement of uniforms not manufactured in the United States, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Homeland Production Security Act or the HOPS Act.

section.header: Prohibition relating to procurement of uniforms not manufactured in United States
